note.p: Birth: Calry, County Sligo, Ireland (19 September 1839)
Death: Prospect House, Omeath, Ireland (01 November 1894)
Burial Place: Mount Jerome Cemetery, Ireland

Career: Obtained a commission in the Royal Engineers (1858); served in Canada (1863-1868); Instructor in signalling, Chatham; Instructor in Telegraphy (1871); Major (1879); Electrical adviser to the Borad of Trade (1883); Instructor of Submarine Defence, War Office (1884); Lieutenant Colonel (by 1889); Colonel (1890); retired (1892)
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc 1894-1895 vol 57 pp xxii-xxiv signed by P A M
